website_summaries.verdict: Attractive and sturdy stemless plastic champagne flutes that are convenient for everyday use or events alike.
pros: Basic yet durable plastic champagne flutes that can be washed and reused if desired
Recyclable, making them a good choice for the environment
cons: These are easy to knock over due to their narrow base

customer_reviews.title: Surprise about the size
customer_reviews.text: They are pretty “my mistake didn’t check exactly the size to small” but anyway I’ll keep them. I decided to take a pic beside a regular bottle of water like that you can see how big they are, that for one of those who are not familiarize with oz.
customer_reviews.author: Rolita :)

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for parties!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Bought them for a mimosa bar. Thick sturdy plastic, won’t crack. And honestly I think you could hand wash and reuse (they might melt in the dishwasher). Great if you want the look of glass without the breakability factor.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Wadsworth

customer_reviews.title: NOT RECYCLABLE.
customer_reviews.text: So, it says these are recyclable-- but that is NOT TRUE. There is NO recycling symbol (plastics 1-7) anywhere on them. Now that China is no longer allowing the US to ship them our plastics to recycle, these are all going straight into that continent of plastic garbage floating in the Pacific. I'm returning them, as I only bought them because I thought I could recycle them.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Glasses Perfect Price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect glass for the price. Needed them for a last minute wedding shower. They were a great price and looked great. Also, we rewashed them and they're easily reusable multiple times. Money well spent Also easily stackable - they lock into each other.
customer_reviews.author: T. Crossland

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, cheap, sturdy, and held up in the dishwasher!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a brunch party. They were a little easy to spill because the base is more narrow than the rest of the glass, but luckily they bounced right off my sharp patio chattahoochee and not a single one broke. They look expensive but they're light, and bonus: I sent mine through the dishwasher and had no problems (I don't know if that's recommended but mine were fine on the top rack). So, you can get at least two uses out of these! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Nice affordable option to glass flutes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to use for the mimosa bar at the bridal shower I was hosting. They were exactly what I was looking for - a more modern looking, affordable option to glass champagne flutes. They are made from very sturdy plastic compared to the cheap disposable kind. One review indicated that they could be tippy, but I think that would only happen if you're outside & it's windy, or you place on an uneven surface. My guests used a wine glass marker to write their names on the flutes which washed off easily when done using. Love that these are reusable, they stack & have lids for compact storage. Priced right - very affordable. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Laurel McCaleb

customer_reviews.title: Better than what I expected
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought they wereTwo small but once I was actually using it actually was a perfect size. I actually liked how they stuck together soon when I was transporting it from my house to the bridal shower it wasn’t like it was everywhere. I thought they look too cheap but actually everybody complimented how cute they were they were perfect favor/ glass to use for mimosas. And of course I couldn’t beat the price
customer_reviews.author: Laura C.

customer_reviews.title: Happy New Year!
customer_reviews.text: So...these work fantastically well as glasses. They have a nicer weight and appearance than the cheap ones you'd buy at Target or a grocery store. They definitely have a nice hand feel and they look more upmarket than the cheap blow-mold kind in stores. It's probably on me for not reading closely enough, but I was under the impression that these were dishwasher safe. They may well be, however if you do put these in your dishwasher DO NOT use the heat dry setting. It will melt these into little raisins. I'd probably hand wash these. At least they're recyclable.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry T

customer_reviews.title: Mimosa Bar Approved
customer_reviews.text: After looking at different products all over amazon and reading the reviews I decided to go with this product and I’m so glad I did!! I 100% recommend and will be buying more for my bachelorette party and any party in the future that require these. Obsessed with them and highly recommend!!! They don’t feel cheap AT ALL which was really important to me. They are definitely high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Celine Tapia

customer_reviews.title: Great champagne flutes for a party
customer_reviews.text: If you're like me, I lose a glass champagne flute at practically every party. When faced with hosting NYE at my house, this was very concerning for my dwindling glass champagne flute collection. Enter these champagne flutes! They're super attractive and sturdy, and won't break if dropped. I also bought some glittery sticky letters and put everyone's initials on their own champagne flute, which my guests appreciated. I would definitely buy these if I host NYE again!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Musselman

customer_reviews.title: Nice resuable glasses
customer_reviews.text: I really like this got these for a brunch and didn't want glass for this group b/c other events we've had glasses broke and it's a pain for that to happen during an event. I wanted to get something this time that looked elegant and reusable and that's when I came across this. I recommend puncturing in the middle of the opened end, so you don't scratch the sides. Easy storage as they interlock. I really like them and so did my friends.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Stemless glasses are a wonderful idea, very popular
customer_reviews.text: Stemless glasses are a wonderful idea, very popular. These are of thick construction and lightweight. I bought them for a bridal shower in my backyard. The reason I gave four stars is because if there is any wind, as these glasses empty, they are likely to tip over. We had quite a number of spills throughout the afternoon. They can be washed and reused, if you wish.
customer_reviews.author: wendy stratton

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these! They are disposable but also reusable. Quality is great and they are also stackable for storage. Used these from brunch and saving them for the next one. Looks and feels like they will be good for at least 10 uses.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Oh yes buy them!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love these flutes. They were a Hit at my party. My friends thought that they were glass. They were extremely impressed when they discovered that they were plastic and it could be reused when washed. They were packaged well, no broken or cracked glasses. Great purchase and value. Exceeded my expectations tremendously.
customer_reviews.author: Tammie

customer_reviews.title: These Flutes are NO FLUKE!
customer_reviews.text: These flutes are perfect! They are clear and sturdy so it works well for if you need to move around and you don't want to purchase glass in fear of them breaking. This product doesn't look like cheap plastic. I love that some of the flutes come with a topper so that if you are traveling liquid won't spill. The value for the money is spot on! I'm personalizing them for my bridesmaids and the decals I used were perfect on these flutes I definitely recommend this product! (Name decals are from a different company)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for parties
customer_reviews.text: We planned to have friends over for mimosas and wine, so this was a good economical way to make sure all of our guests had a nice "glass" rather than splurging on actual glasses or using plastic red cups. They look just like glass, but they're durable lightweight plastic, which I actually like better since we don't have to worry about accidental breakage. They also hold just the right amount of liquid and they stand fine on their own. They can also be washed and reused, which is great. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jheneya

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Impression
customer_reviews.text: I love these, I used them for my beach wedding. I was worried about the heat melting them ( I've read about it happening to compostable ware) but I still have some of these. I washed mine and reuse ... they are in great condition... crystal clear... rims are soft and smooth... Perfect size for champagne. I would definetly buy them again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High end plastic ware
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with these plastic flutes. The feel and the look are amazing. I had many guests comment about their quality and look. I threw them all in a sink full of soapy water and rinsed them off and put them on a towel to dry. They’re very easily re-usable. I’m sure they would be fine in the dishwasher without the heated drying section. I would highly recommend them for anyone that doesn’t want to spend a lot of money on glassware for a party or brunch.
customer_reviews.author: L. C.

customer_reviews.title: these look like glass!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased these for a weekend getaway with a group of girls and we all loved these. You get the sleekness of a glass flute without the fragility and these are better than a lot of other disposable cups because they are recyclable and look so much better! We wrote our names on them in metallic sharpie in effort to use as few as possible and they looked super cute. Great for parties.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Not good for a party
customer_reviews.text: Not good for a party. Too deep. A norrnal Champagne Glass pour fills these only 1/4 of the way. So 1 of these is like having 4 Glasses of Champagne. The appearance is deceiving. Also by the time you would finish it, your Champagne would be room temperature. Pretty but Design Fail
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy little glasses
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for a bridal shower and everyone was so impressed! They were shocked they were plastic and loved that they were stemless since we were outside. Perfect size for mimosas! I know the package says hand wash only, but I put them in the top rack and ran a quick cycle (no heated dry) and they came out perfectly clean- no issues! Stacked them and put them back in the box for the next party!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan M.

customer_reviews.title: Great fake champagne flute
customer_reviews.text: Every year I get more and more people coming for New Years. I don't have that many flutes, so I thought I'd try these hoping they weren't really cheap like the plastic ones you buy at the grocery. These are much stronger than those, and look very nice all placed together. Good shape that held it's form after washing (by hand! Don't put in dishwasher!) They snap together two by two for storing purposes.
customer_reviews.author: ALC

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality. Looks nice and feels nice. Easy to wash too!
customer_reviews.text: Yes I said easy to wash because generally do not like disposable products. But I wanted something to use for a champagne parfait and couldn’t justify buying new glasses for a group. These worked great. These look nice and look clear like glass. feel nice in your hand, sturdy, and a nice quality. I washed and towel dried them and they look like new so I can use them again next year.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Tiedt

customer_reviews.title: Remarkable Quality in an Inexpensive Flute!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for our family Christmas Eve gathering. Everything it says in the description is accurate. The rounded lip, the ‘heft’ if the filled glasses, the perfectly balanced shape all contribute to the sense that they are made out of glass. When a full glass is lifted it’s obvious that they aren’t glass but... who cares? It’s champagne!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Bierman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for use when glass won't do
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for a celebration my husband and I are having for our neighbor, who just got a new job. We haven't used them yet, however I did take them out of the box and wash them (by hand, as instructed.) They will be perfect for toasting our happy neighbor. I like that I can use them over and over, but recycle them when they need to be retired. We'll just have to plan more celebrations!
customer_reviews.author: munchie

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for hosting Mother’s Day brunch. They worked perfectly for mimosas and looked classy...just like a real glass! They were sturdy and didn’t tip easy (I was worried about this). I washed them after and definitely will be reusing them as they held up great! Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Emily christen

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Even though I read the description, I had not idea how small this item turned out to be. They are a smaller quantity, but still usable. I have to say the are made very well. Have not been used yet as they were purchased for a function that has not happened yet. Despite the small size, I am looking forward to trying them out.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for party!
customer_reviews.text: Ok you can’t beat these cute champagne flutes when you have a party where you know your gonna end up throwing them away! Way better quality than the flutes you have to put together and more stylish too. We added some peelable stickers from crate & barrel and the guests were super impressed. JThey were perfect for my sisters bridal shower.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Great Cups for the Price!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for some simple, classy cups for my Mother's Day dinner table. I didn't want anything too big and these were the perfect size. If you are looking for big cups I would not recommend these. But if you want something small for cocktails these are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Ms L80

customer_reviews.title: Good for party, 1 or 2 time use
customer_reviews.text: Great for cheap throwaways. Used for Christmas party when i didn't have enough matching glass flutes. Heads up, had to buy a 2nd box cause hadnt read directions and put first batch in dishwasher just on rinse and dry...they shrunk to size of shot glass LOL
customer_reviews.author: Amy P.

customer_reviews.title: pretty and will last you
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely not one time use if you take care of them! I used them for my party, hand wash them and will definitely use it many more times until they break. Worth the price! Look classy and it doesn't feel like it can break any second.
customer_reviews.author: Patrycja

customer_reviews.title: Everyone thought they were glass
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for a bachelorette party mimosa bar. They arrived well-packaged, and everyone was surprised when they picked them up because they look like glass. High quality, would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: CA

customer_reviews.title: Nice & Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Loved these for a brunch I had. Perfect size for the mimosa's I served. I liked the fact that they didn't have a stem so were more sturdy which is important when you are drinking! They looked nice and held up well. I was able to wash them all and will be able to use them again which is a bonus!
customer_reviews.author: carin carlton

customer_reviews.title: Bridesmaid Glasses
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to put names on for me and my bridesmaids while we are getting ready for the wedding. I love how they fit together and stack. We wont have to worry about them breaking if they tip over!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail E

customer_reviews.title: Diy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for bridal party champagne! Easy diy instead of paying 5-7 dollars for them to be customized I just got the vinyl and I am putting them on there myself ! Perfect for diy wedding
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Skomsky

customer_reviews.title: Fail
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something pool safe and reusable. These are “one and done” cheap plastic, not acrylic. Very expensive for what they are! Tried washing them in my dishwasher and they melted into plastic blobs. Not even sure they are BPA free, but either way, they are a fail.
customer_reviews.author: C. Almirall

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I had a mimosa bar and used this product for my drink holders and everyone was amazed of the quality and how realistic they were to the glass ones i was able to wash them and reuse them for future gatherings. I stored them back in the box they came with I would definitely be buying other products from this company
customer_reviews.author: Anabel

customer_reviews.title: A bit small but outstanding quality
customer_reviews.text: We liked this Tossware product although found them less useful than the 14 oz recyclable plastic cups. This size is too small for beer and suits for prosecco or champagne. They are supposed to stack but we had problems with that function after they were washed and dried. I would order the larger size next time...quality, though, is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Bernardi

customer_reviews.title: They didn’t want to put them in the recycling bin
customer_reviews.text: These are very high quality disposable flutes. The plastic was very thin and sturdy. Next best thing to glass. The hostess insisted on saving the flutes for reuse instead of the recycling bin. I recommend these for any party.
customer_reviews.author: B. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Do it. But then. You won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.text: So worth it! I used these for mimosas at our party and it was great! They wash easily too and can be reused for sure! I will be repurchasing for my bridal shower!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: The only compliant I have is they really are only a one time use. I tried washing them and they became dull. But besides that they made my mimosa bar look amazing! They look like glass. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: L. Lara

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: These looked great for the party that we had. They are just a plastic flute cup but no one broke one and they worked as they should have. Would recommend for anyone looking for a cheap solution to champagne glasses that they don't need often.
customer_reviews.author: Mat

customer_reviews.title: Feel fancy drinks.
customer_reviews.text: Used for getting hair and make up done “before wedding” mimosas. Made it feel fancy for the bride instead of cheap plastic cups. They are light weight. When empty they knock over easily. They stand up fine with liquid inside.
customer_reviews.author: D. Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Love the thinness of the plastic
customer_reviews.text: They were smaller than I thought bit great for pina colada or champagne. Wine cooler goes great too. I do recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: Great disposable option for champagne! (RECYCLE AFTERWARDS!!)
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want to get those cheap ready to assemble champagne glasses that everyone spills out of. I liked that these glassed were stemless because they didn't tip over easily and you can easily use them again, wash and stick them together and put them back in the box! the bottom of one glass fits securely into the top of another glass for easy stacking.
customer_reviews.author: balltr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your party!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to have some throwaway flutes on hand. I am very pleased with the quality! Despite being tossable you could easily reuse these flutes. As others have suggested these would be party perfect to set out on a table with markers, glitter or whatever else desired to allow your guest to decorate or bedazzle their custom souvenir glass.
customer_reviews.author: Dinks_no_more

customer_reviews.title: High quality!
customer_reviews.text: These are high quality unlike other plastic flutes I’ve purchased. They come wrapped/sealed and are free of any flaws or scratches. Definitely impressed at how clear they look, from far you’d think they are glass! Will purchase more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: The AmazonTrend

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel and parties!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought these a few times for weekend getaways at VRBO/Airbnb homes where we’re celebrating a bachelorette or birthday with a group of girls. Ensures we don’t accidentally knock over and break another person’s glassware. Easy to write names on too.
customer_reviews.author: jrpreston

customer_reviews.title: They won’t break, very presentable
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a real champagne glass. Use it for guest when I have more than 4 people having wine. Easy to wash, easy to Package back up, and sturdy. No scratches thus far, had them for a few months already.
customer_reviews.author: Roy V

customer_reviews.title: Tips over easy
customer_reviews.text: This product looks great, and the toss in the recycle bin was nice. But it was also very easy to knock over. I had several spills from folks lightly touching and knocking over, I don't think I will purchase these again
customer_reviews.author: MissPoozle

customer_reviews.title: A must have for big parties!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these tossware glasses for a New Year's Eve party and was very happy with my purchase. They are sturdier and nicer than the party store plastic ones, yet put my mind at ease more than tipsy people carrying glass stemware around my apartment. After the party I hand washed them and packed them up for next year. Totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are cute plastic champagne glasses, but they are completely clear- there is no "glitter" or any decoration on the cup like it appears in the picture. I used them in my "bridesmaid proposal" boxes and they worked very well. I wrote the girl's initials on the cups using a paint marker and it really added a nice touch to the glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: These were a great purchase. I was under the impression that these were glass but they are not. It worked out great though because I had two of my guests dropped their glasses and it could have been a disaster if they had been real glass. These flutes are amazing quality and they look like real glass. I most definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for parties
customer_reviews.text: Used these for a mimosa bar and was pleasantly surprised at how many people asked if they should rinse their glasses when they were finished! They feel excellent and hold more than the average champagne flute
customer_reviews.author: Kimber Rosee

customer_reviews.title: Good but small
customer_reviews.text: They were smaller than I expected but they worked well for my get together considering Covid19 they worked well for mojitos..
customer_reviews.author: belinda mckinnney

customer_reviews.title: Flutes are great but check them all to make sure they aren't dented!
customer_reviews.text: I would like to give this product 5 stars, but one of the three boxes of 9 ounce flutes we ordered was sent damaged from Amazon. The shipping box was fine, but the product box was dented and TAPED together; all 12 flutes inside it were dented. Luckily, it turned out we only needed 24 flutes, not 36. The flutes in the other two boxes were fine and perfectly met our needs. Guests commented on how nice the flutes were. They were solid to hold and good to drink from. A couple of people comment on the website about receiving damaged flutes, so I checked them soon after they were delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are good for a 1-3x use. MUST hand wash. Accidentally tried to put them on a quick cycle in the dishwasher and they melted into funny looking things. I would have preferred something heavier, as using these outside leaves them susceptible to blowing over with any wind.
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: fast shipping FYI they are plastic!
customer_reviews.text: I love these!! I needed a smaller glass to fit into my bridesmaid proposal boxes, this was the perfect fit. THANKFUL that it was plastic because before I gifted them I probably dropped them 100 times. I added a vinyl decal onto them with no problem. None were cracked or anything and they shipped days before they said it would come in! Probably going to buy some more as wedding things get closer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: these are cute but they melt in the dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: If you're truly planning to use these once then they are cute and sturdy. But I didin't want to toss them after a first use. They would do find with handwashing but they distorted considerably in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: nkb

customer_reviews.title: Great for picnics or camping
customer_reviews.text: These are great plastic glasses for picnics or camping. Good price for the amount that you get. I even gave some away.
customer_reviews.author: Amberlinn

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are good quality. I’ve used them multiple times for drinks by the pool and Hand washed them with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome glasses
customer_reviews.text: The stress Champaign glasses were great. The quality was there and they made such a great addition to the bubbly bar. We had them decorated with bride's theme words in gold and they turned out great. I would purchase this line again.
customer_reviews.author: suzied

customer_reviews.title: Classy and reusable
customer_reviews.text: Truly classy and great weight and I love how they snap together for easier storage. We used these for a party, ran them through the dishwaser and they came out sparkly clean and ready for the next. Great upgrade from disposable flutes and perfect for parties and picnics. Will be giving these as gifts in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Maura

customer_reviews.title: Strong & sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Use it everyday to drink my wine, soda, water & juice from. So happy I didn't let the reviews of other stop me from buying them.
customer_reviews.author: Kisha McIntosh

customer_reviews.title: Top quality plastic glasses
customer_reviews.text: Nice for serving bubbly, especially when many glasses are needed. Crystal clear. Tough enough to be reused several times. Dishwasher safe--but do NOT dry with heat. They will melt.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon B

customer_reviews.title: These are fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for mimosas at a baby shower and they were perfect. Such a great cost for larger events and are still classy and look beautiful. LOVED them.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Very glass-like without the breakage!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect flutes for our annual mom-mosa brunch! They are very well made and almost look like glass - without the concern of breakage! Which is a huge win. They are sturdy and able to be reused. The gals took theirs home as favors.
customer_reviews.author: @postitnotepromises

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and nice-looking
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for an anniversary celebration. They are a nice quality clear plastic and feel substantial, not flimsy. I like that the top of the flute doesn’t have a rolled edge or thick rim.
customer_reviews.author: Gmama in the Harbor

customer_reviews.title: Sophisticated, easy, stackable!!!
customer_reviews.text: We used these for a big family get-together to serve pretty drinks, and they were perfect. Pretty, well-made, stackable, and re-usable. We just hand-washed and will use them next time!
customer_reviews.author: K. A. Lennon

customer_reviews.title: Better than Expected
customer_reviews.text: These were so much better than I expected. I love that they didn't feel flimsy and actually felt like real cups - not disposable. I also like that they are individually packaged in two packs and stack nicely making them perfect for a picnic or to bring anywhere. I HIGHLY recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kfulls

customer_reviews.title: Stackable, Good Quality, Inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: Tossware may be my new favorite thing. I love products like Corelle ware, Pyrex...high quality reasonable price. Easy to stack, organize, and store. These fit the bill. I love the way the glasses stack, not just stack, but clip together. I saved them all after a birthday party where we served a pink champagne cocktail with mint. They got put back nicely in the small box for the upcoming massage party.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Kinue

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: These cups are great!!! Durable plastic, tough, shatter proof and stackable. What more would you want? Lol they look fancy at any party 😆
customer_reviews.author: Cass

customer_reviews.title: Looked Expensive, and perfect for Bridal Shower!
customer_reviews.text: We used these for a bridal shower. In these COVID times being able to have plastic items at a shower to make sure everyone stayed and felt safe and didn't have to clean or use glasses that were shared these came to the rescue! They were a great addition to the shower!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Rauck

customer_reviews.title: Great wine glasses
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my mom’s retirement party in February. We wanted wine glasses that were durable and wouldn’t break. These are so stylish and were perfect for the party.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Cher

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: The flutes are precious. Everyone loved them a d wanted their own for keeps!
customer_reviews.author: Ella H

customer_reviews.title: More than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I used these at a friend's party and liked them enough to order a set for the holidays. My family was impressed and surprised to discover that they are dishwasher safe. We don't throw away plastic. Beverages taste great in this product. We drank juices, champagne and champagne cocktails over Christmas and felt festive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used for Bridal Shower
customer_reviews.text: I set up a mimosa bar for my sisters bridal shower so I need flute glasses in bulk. These were exactly what I needed. They were a thicker plastic which is what I liked about them so they were sturdy. Also, they looked really nice considering they were plastic and everything else I had was glass. I thought these were perfect for a bunch of women drinking and walking around chit chatting. Once I was done with them I washed them out and recycled most of them but kept a few around the house in case they were needed again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable+Tall
customer_reviews.text: Great to write a medium-sized name on the glass, very sturdy (dropped a few times). Clear, NOT sparkly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong and reuseable
customer_reviews.text: Really strong acrylic cups. Perfect for any type of party or social occasion. Loved them!
customer_reviews.author: jasminda caballero

customer_reviews.title: They Look Like Glass!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I bought them for a shower so I wouldn't have to wash glasses, but they are so nice and I did wash them and used them again. They actually look like glass once you add the champagne. Plus you don't have to worry about breakage! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: janman

customer_reviews.title: Cute & sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Bought them for my bridesmaid proposals & put their names on it— so cute! My bridesmaids loved them :)
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy enough for repeated use
customer_reviews.text: These are marketed as disposable, but they are sturdy enough for repeated use. They are clear and look like real glass. They can be a little wobbly when they are empty because they are lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Katie R

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Packaged nicely and sturdy! Great affordable option and worked perfectly for my bridesmaid proposal boxes! 😊
customer_reviews.author: Cali M.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, high quality, used for NYE toast
customer_reviews.text: They even interlock for easy storage. I know I was supposed to "toss" them, but got so many compliments on NYE that I kept a few. Put in top of dishwasher & they came out beautifully. I'm sure the co would rather they got tossed so we buy more, hence the name : )
customer_reviews.author: J. Cafar

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a brunch I hosted with some girlfriends. They are great! You must hand wash though as I put one in the dish washer and it melted.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Price

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels like a real champagne glass
customer_reviews.text: Poolside champagne in solo cups?? NEVER! Risk broken glass in your tropical oasis?? NOPE! Looks and feels like a real champagne glass, but it's a stemless, shatterproof, BPA free, recyclable plastic. Keep it classy kids, up your game w these badboys.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Mimosa's fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these plastic glasses for a Mimosa's brunch. Perfect size. They're very light. So make sure you're not in a windy area. They came fast and none were damaged. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: C.A.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I was really nervous to purchase these, I was super scared they were going to be flimsy and a waste of money. Boy, was I wrong!! These are SO worth it, and won't break the bank!!
customer_reviews.author: Ionna

customer_reviews.title: They are much better than your usually plastic drink ware
customer_reviews.text: I used these for a prom send off "champagne" toast. They are very high quality plastic flutes and even though it says you can toss them out I'm keeping them for future parties. They are much better than your usually plastic drink ware. And for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Stace

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and look very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the champagne toast at my son’s rehearsal dinner. They came well packaged. These glasses could easily be washed and re-used. We didn’t do that but they are good sturdy quality and very nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Keri O.

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT leave in the sun!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful design and look but do not leave in the sun! Bought these for a baby shower and the bottoms popped out after being in the sun for an hour so most couldn’t be used at all or they would tip over. A total waste of money :(
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Y.

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. They snap into each other so you can carry 2 full glasses in each hand. I got them to walk around the neighborhood during local events. I highly recommend. I haven’t put them in the dishwasher... afraid they could warp.
customer_reviews.author: StacyFL

customer_reviews.title: Looks high end!
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute, easy to store and clean. From afar, you'd think they were glass. I wish they were just a little heavier, they do tip over very easy, so beware!
customer_reviews.author: jostaze

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: Used these for a mimosa bar at a bachelorette party - worked great! Easy to clean, packaged safely, and wont break when dropped!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Young

customer_reviews.title: Great for social distancing toasts
customer_reviews.text: These are wrapped in sets of 2 in the box. We put 2 in a bag along with a small bottle of bubbly for our socially distant wedding toast. Love that they were sealed.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Loveless

customer_reviews.title: Affordable alternative without compromising on style!
customer_reviews.text: Disposable, light weight without compromising style! From pictures you could never tell these were plastic!!! The ladies loved them and they are a fraction of glass champagne flutes!
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: they come damaged
customer_reviews.text: I thought the glasses would be great, but they came with multiple glasses damaged. I needed them so i didn't send them back. Now because they are not dishwasher safe I would never reorder them again!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Freifeld

customer_reviews.title: At first I didn't think I was gonna like the plastic
customer_reviews.text: At first I didn't think I was gonna like the plastic, but it's perfect for accidents! I personalize them for my friends bachelorette party!
customer_reviews.author: sophia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect boat mimosa glasses!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed! They really do look like real glass and they stack on top of each other which is good for storage. Will be using a lot this summer. I plan on washing and reusing. Will be using on a boat, so needed plastic. Very fancy looking. I can’t wait to share with my boating family!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Hamm

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: Used them right away for a gathering for some mimosas. Also Liked the durability.
customer_reviews.author: Yadira

product_meta.title: TOSSWARE POP 9oz Flute SET OF 12, Recyclable, Unbreakable & Crystal Clear Plastic Champagne Glasses
product_meta.description: Size:SET OF 12TOSSWARE is the perfect upscale disposable (but 100% recyclable! ) drinkware for any occasion. Our products embody the elegant look and feel of crystal without the shatter. Best of all, they are BPA-free and made with the highest quality recycled PET polymer, so you can save the planet without sacrificing sophistication. It’s style meets simplicity with TOSSWARE! Search terms (optional) : tossware 9 oz shatterproof champagne and cocktail glass bpa free upscale recyclable disposable plastic flute, stemless detachable stackable flexible wedding cater pool bbq party outdoor kitchen dinner glasses cup cups pool govino ridel taza solo tasting arcylic picnic chinet flute pint tumbler jr flight taster beer champagne whiskey mimosa red white pinot noir chardonnay ipa scotch merlot
feature_bullets: Perfect for your next birthday party, bridal shower, outdoor celebration and any occasion. Toast and clink to your heart’s content — no chips, no cracks, just cheers.
No glass = no stress. 100% recyclable, guaranteed to never break or crack, and crystal clear. Just add Friends!
Smart patented features include a rounded rim for smooth drinking and Pop ’n Lock for easy stackability and storage.
Each glass is made from up to 1 recycled plastic bottle and is 100% BPA-Free.
Feel free to reuse, but as a reminder, please hand wash them only with a gentle, non-abrasive sponge as our BPA-free material is not dishwasher safe.
Featured in POPSUGAR, Buzzfeed, Food & Wine and Business Insider.
Ideal for serving champagne, rosé, mimosas, sparkling cocktails and more. The glass measures is 2.2” in diameter and 5.8” high.
